content: समासः {@--1@} Aggregation, union, composition. {@--2@} Composition of words, a compound; (the principal kinds of compounds are four:--द्वंद्व, तत्पुरुष, बहुव्रीहि, and अव्ययीभाव q. <ab>q. v.</ab> v.). {@--3@} Reconciliation, composition of differences. {@--4@} A collection, an assemblage. {@--5@} Whole, totality. {@--6@} Contraction, conciseness, brevity. {@--7@} Euphonic combination (संधि). (समासेन, समासतः means ‘in short’, ‘briefly’, ‘succinctly’; एषा धर्मस्य वो योनिः समासेन प्रकीर्तिता <ls>Ms. 2. 25</ls>, <ls n="Ms.">3. 20</ls>; <ls>Bg. 13. 18</ls>; समासतः श्रूयतां <ls>V. 2</ls>).
